title: A Potential Bangladesh-Pakistan-China Axis: Why India Has Its Eye On Dhaka
summary_full: The February 12 general election in Bangladesh  the first since a violent civil uprising in July 2024 forced then-PM Sheikh Hasina to flee  will be monitored by India for shifts in regional geopolitics that could affect national security.
